title: Stamina
brief_description: A film illustrating the manufacture of Stamina trousers and showing the care exercised in all stages. The various processes are shown together with a brief history of men’s dress and the sewing machine.
description: A film illustrating the manufacture of Stamina trousers and showing the care exercised in all stages. The various processes are shown together with a brief history of men’s dress and the sewing machine.
